name: discord.js
author: harry@tvhg.club
description: An egg designed to run discord.js bots.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y curl
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -f .pteroignore ]; then
    curl -sSL -o .pteroignore https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PteroEggs/discord.js/main/.pteroignore
fi

exit 0
